body: Is Wikileaks bad for Zimbabwe?: "In this particular case, the argument that (A) because the cable hurts Tsvangirai and helps Mugabe, (B) Wikileaks is therefore bad for democracy, and therefore (C) bad for Zimbabweans, is a set of propositions linked together by a lot of un-argued claims."
original_body: Is Wikileaks bad for Zimbabwe?: "In this particular case, the argument that (A) because the cable hurts Tsvangirai and helps Mugabe, (B) Wikileaks is therefore bad for democracy, and therefore (C) bad for Zimbabweans, is a set of propositions linked together by a lot of un-argued claims."
title: Zimbabwe: Is Wikileaks bad for Zimbabwe?
